Test Name: Total Unbound Nitrogen (TUNA), Immunoglobulin E (IgE), and Serum Analysis
Specimen Type: Serum or heparinized plasma (TUNA); Serum or plasma (IgE); Serum (general analyses)
Purpose: To obtain accurate, reliable, and reproducible diagnostic results for Total Unbound Nitrogen, evaluate Immunoglobulin E levels for allergy assessment, and perform routine biochemical analyses on serum samples.
Container: Serum or plasma collection tubes (e.g., serum separator or heparinized tubes)
Equipment: Automated chemistry analyzer or immunoassay analyzer, with supporting centrifuge and pipettes
